## DataSourceConfiguration type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DataSourceConfiguration<DE extends DatasourceEngine = DatasourceEngine> = DE extends 'dynamodb' ? {
    engine: DE;
} : {
    engine: DE;
    connectionUri: BackendSecret;
    vpcConfig?: VpcConfig;
    identifier?: string;
    sslCert?: BackendSecret;
};
```
